oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Cotton on the Levee
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: “Cotton On The Levee, Memphis, Tennessee” Color image with many bales of cotton stacked in front of two boats, two donkeys, at the forefront of the image; Mississippi River showing just slightly in the background.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Mississippi River; rivers; levees; boats; riverfront; water transportation; cotton; cotton trade;
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Photograph courtesy Memphis Chamber of Commerce
oai_dc:dc.dc:publisher: National Druggist Sundry Co., Memphis, Tennessee
oai_dc:dc.dc:contributor: ‘Colourpicture’ Publication, Cambridge, Mass.; Collection processed by Angela Price
